phenoreportr

The phenoreportr package provides a simple R interface for cleaning phenotypes and generating reports for phenotypes of interest.

Links

  • phenoreportr @GitHub
  • phenoreportr @Documentation

Installation

First clone the repo from github:

$ git clone git@github.com:Ancestry/NatGenCOVIDpaper2022.git
$ cd clean_pheno_package/phenoreportr

Next, install the package from R console:

> install.packages("devtools")
> library(devtools)
> devtools::install()
